intro: Dendrochilum philippinense var. purpureum, commonly known as the Purple Philippine Tree Orchid, is a unique orchid species native to the Philippines. It is characterized by its striking purple or violet flowers, which bloom in clusters along the stems. The plant is an epiphytic orchid, meaning it grows on the surfaces of trees without being parasitic.
